![CrowdSec Logo](images/logo_crowdsec.png)
# CrowdSec CAPI Python SDK

## Developer guide


## Local installation

### Virtual environment

```bash
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
```

### Install dependencies

```bash
pip install --upgrade pip
python install -r requirements.txt
pip install -r requirements-dev.txt
```

## Unit tests

```bash
python -m pytest
```
